DOC.brief_summary: This randomize control study Bard High Density Mesh Ablation System treatment paroxysmal atrial fibrillation . This study determine HD Mesh Ablation System safe effective anti-arrhythmic drug .
DOC.brief_title: Study HD Mesh Ablation System Treatment Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Patients symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation fail least one class I III antiarrhythmic drug Other inclusion criterion Previous surgical catheter ablation treat AF Permanent AF Uncontrolled unstable medical condition Other exclusion criterion
